review_data.title: Best Sushi ever!!
review_data.content: Das Ginger ist mein absolutes Lieblingsrestaurant in der Schweiz. Ich komme immer wieder zurück und bin jedesmal begeistert.

review_data.title: Don’t even waste your time going there
review_data.content: Completely overpriced for what you get. Tiny little portions that look more like nice appetizers (not even starters…). Taste - nothing outstanding. After the 3 course “dinner” at Ginger we had to go to a different restaurant nearby to finally eat.

review_data.title: Below average

review_data.title: Surprising bill
